name: 3 game pack !!!!!!!!
description:
i made these during game-a-week !! they are not complete games but i like them  

in the zip u will find 3 games :

WITCH GAME

  • for theme: find and click !
  • gameplay: help the witch with her potion by finding her ingredients in the scene !

BIN GAME

  • for theme: ritual !
  • gameplay: decide if you want to join the bin cult

BUG GAME

  • for theme: camerawork !
  • gameplay: take photos of bugs in the garden and have a peaceful time

my twitter is @gracebruxner
